product_name: Magic MoleculeUltimate Bundle Hypochlorous Acid Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleRemove bacteria with a simple spray, whether you‚Äôre at home or on the go. Meet Magic Molecule: a hypochlorous acid spray that helps over 50 common skin ailments. It‚Äôs a daily do-it-all, for all.
details: DetailsFeaturesHelps soothe acne-prone skin, cuts & scrapes, sunburns, eczema, zits, redness, and more.Clarify skin, remove bacteria, reduce redness, minimize imperfections, and naturally calm skinUse whenever your skin needs a boost!Key IngredientsPowered by hypochlorous acid, the same solution naturally produced by our white blood cells for skin healing.Pure, medical-grade, and FDA-clearedFormulated WithoutNon-toxic, all-natural and pet-safe, good for all skin types & safe for sensitive skinFree of alcohol, silicones, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, oil, and talcItem 2630367How To UseSpray solution on skin to flush away any dirt and debris. Spray skin thoroughly and let air dry as often as needed. Use Magic Molecule as the first step in your skincare routine after cleansing, or throughout the day - whenever your skin needs a boost!IngredientsHypochlorous Acid (0.018%), Ionized Water (99.918%), Sodium Chloride (0.06%), Hypochlorite Ion (0.004%)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spray solution on skin to flush away any dirt and debris. Spray skin thoroughly and let air dry as often as needed. Use Magic Molecule as the first step in your skincare routine after cleansing, or throughout the day - whenever your skin needs a boost!

reviews.headline: Love LOVE LOVE !!!
reviews.comments: I use this as my daily toner honestly and it works like a charm and it's so light.

reviews.headline: Shocked at results! No more steroid creams!
reviews.comments: I am honestly shocked at the results in just one week. I have had psoriasis flare ups in my ears (I know, crazy). It actually is triggered by anxiety. Went to the dermatologist and tried a few things as they weren't working - so flaky and itchy. Ended up mixing 50/50 ketoconazole/hydrocortisone several times a week with a few days off in between....for a year! Never fully cleared, so annoying. Got this for my son because he is too lazy to put the creams on nightly the derm gave him for his cystic acne. I was like - what can I lose. So I sprayed it all over my face and my ears a few times a day.....NO DRY PATCHES! Itch gone........no dry, painful flakes in there. It is literally unbelievable! Now my husband is spraying himself all the time too because it made such a difference.

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: Repurchased! Love this product. Truly helps acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: It is Magic!
reviews.comments: This stuff clear up a long standing skin burn which turned into deep deaden skin barrier.  Definitely helps to heal deep scar tissue.

reviews.headline: MAGIC IN A BOTTLE
reviews.comments: Yall i have had horrible breakouts on and off for 10 years. I dont know why i didnt buy this sooner‚Ä¶this stuff WORKS and works FAST. Within 24 hours of using it breakouts are significantly better and it doesnt leave a residue. I spray it everywhere. Only complaint is that the mist could be a little finer and it has the tiniest bit of a chemical smell but its not bad at all. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

reviews.headline: Great hypochlorous acid spray!
reviews.comments: This is a lovely hypochlorous acid spray. The mist is nice and fine, and the bottle is a decent size. It's a great deal if you can snag it on sale!

reviews.headline: ACCIDENTAL HOLY GRAIL
reviews.comments:
Honest & Unbiased: THIS STUFF WORKS, and it works FAST. I purchased this spray while at my wits end with a random breakout that even my dermatologist couldnt cure. Three months into perscription creams that only made it worse, I decided to give this a go. YALL. I am not exxagerating when i say my skin cleared up in less than 24 hours. I will never be withour this again! 

Sprays on evenly, absorbs quickly, no greasy or sticky residue.  Did not cause any irritation and there was no scent. If you're on the fence, it is 100% worth buying. 

Context: Dry, Sensitive, Mature Skin

reviews.headline: üôåüèºüôåüèºüôåüèº
reviews.comments: I cant not use this. Its perfect for breakouts, ingrowns, and first aid. My skin is soooo happy now

reviews.headline: Clogged Pores
reviews.comments: Gave me acne in places I've never had acne before! I have clogged pores suddenly after usage, and it only occurs when I use the spray. I'm attempting to recover from another outbreak - I wanted to try it again and see if it was really the spray. It is. It also smells like chlorine...? And other parts of my body didn't have any changes, just my face.

reviews.headline: Good formula, atomizer needs work
reviews.comments: Pretty on par for a hypochlorous spray, but I found the atomizer lacking, not the finest mist, some large droplets, and if you don't use the rifht pressure and speed, it squirts and dribbles out. full size may have a better atomizer. Go for Prequel

reviews.headline: Amazing for many things!!
reviews.comments: If you're like me and have tried pretty much every product to help calm skin, prevent and clear acne but havent found that one thing that actually works, this is definitely worth a try!!! Being 25 and still getting consistent acne has been draining in many ways. Ive been using this for a few weeks now and not only is my skin calmer and acne almost gone, my skin has this nice glow and almost glass skin shine to it now. I have very oily skin and it's definitely not an oily shine at all, if that makes sense. This is the only thing that I've introduced to my skin care in the past 6 months(ish) so i know its this product doing it. Also I've been using it to calm bug bites and even spray on my dog whos been experiencing skin allergies. I havent even used 1/4 of the bottle and I spray pretty generously. I will definitely keep purchasing!!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: This is one of my holy grail skincare items! I use it in the morning and nighttime after washing my face. I don't have eczema flare ups or breakouts on the face anymore!

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I use this throughout a long warm/hot day and after the gym and i am completely obsessed! Helps prevent breakouts.

reviews.headline: MAGIC
reviews.comments: You need this product if you breakout consistently! Ive had this for almost a week and I can already see a change in my skin. If you have acne prone skin dont hesitate!

reviews.headline: This product is exactly what i was looking for
reviews.comments: I was looking for a spray to cool my face off but one that was also cleaning without me having to clean.this is amazing! Smells like a pool but i love this! You can even spray it on cuts! When youre sweating spray and go.

reviews.headline: OH MY GOSH THIS IS AMAZING!
reviews.comments: My daughter uses this for her acne and it has really helped clear up her face. My other daughter was sunburned and we sprayed the Magic Molecule on her face and it also worked great for her sensitive skin. I love this product and it will be a staple in our home from now on.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: this stuff is great! it cleared my skin and my rosacea!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS STUFF!
reviews.comments:
First things first, the spray bottle mist on this porduct is PERFECT. It sprays evenly and disperses nicely, so I don't feel like I need to spray it a million times. I am very picky about my spray bottles/mist and this exceeds my expectations and I wish more products of mine had the same mist-er. 

Secondly, this product doesn't break me out (acne prone, dry skin) like other antimicrobial spraye have, and I feel super fresh and clean after. It also leaves a nice glow and my skin feels soft. It's a giant bottle that will last a long time. In my opinion it is worth the price. It doesn't have any weird smell either.

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: I use this spray daily. I spray it onto my face every morning and every night (after I wash my face) before bed. My face is completely clear. I've never really had issues with acne, but this has prevented those pop ups. 10/10

reviews.headline: Amazing facial spray
reviews.comments: Seriously this product is so versatile!! Spray it before makeuo application and after and makeup is flawless. Kills the bacteria on your skin preventing breakouts. Really great to use regularly throughout the day!! Its prevented and controlled my breakouts love this set!

faceoff_positive.comments: Okay, story time. I have had bad skin since I was a child. I have eczema, mild psoriasis, extremely dry skin, ultra sensitive skin, perioral dermatitis, I am acne-prone (blackheads, whiteheads, cysts, you name it). When I say I have dry skin, it cracks and peels in large sections. When I say I have sensitive skin, a speck of dirt or dust in the wind could touch it and I have a painful dermatitis outbreak which takes more than a week to heal (that actually happened). I tried everything over the counter‚Äîa few products over the years have helped calm my skin a bit but nothing got to the root of the problem. I saw multiple dermatologists and each one gave me different triggers‚Äîhormones, diet, skin care products with heavy chemicals‚Äîand I did both oral and topical products. Nothing helped. A year ago, I saw an advertisement for MM and decided I would try it. What could it hurt? Well it didn't hurt. Instead, I healed.   Now my skin is clear and glowing and supple. I use this every time I wash my face and then apply my other products on top of it. The dermatitis is gone. The cysts are gone. The eczema and psoriasis are gone. Even a patch of embarrassing granuloma annulare (a side effect of my hypoglycemia) I have struggled with all around my neck has disappeared for the first time since I was 13 (I'm 31 now).   My skin looks so good, many people believe I'm in my early 20s and are shocked to learn how old I really am. MM is an absolute miracle in a bottle!! I am a forever customer so please never stop producing this! Nothing else compares to this one simple bottle of a wish come true. Thank you a million times, MM!
faceoff_positive.headline: This is long, but may help someone else!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I want it to be magic. I really do. Maybe I just need to adjust my expectations? Maybe "magic" is an oversell? I have spots all around my hairline and the edges of my face that especially in winter, get pink, feel dry, and occasionally flaky. Eczema is the worst. I used Magic Molecule twice (or more) a day for two weeks and maybe things sliiiightly improved? I took pics to compare and it definitely wasn't a night-and-day thing for me. But things didn't get worse, so that's something. I think I was expecting a Miracle Molecule. Spraying it on my face felt very bougie and luxurious, I will say that. I might try another bottle. I really want it to work, and I'm sad it wasn't a drastic thing for me. One thing I'll flag that felt off - the bottles I ordered were shipped "naked" during whatever label shortage the company was having. Which to me was totally fine, I couldn't care less. But then I read that hydrochlorous acid is quite unstable and decomposes over time into essentially water - and that exposure to light expedites that process quite dramatically. I mostly had my bottles in my medicine cabinet, but I don't feel like I was instructed to keep it in a dark place and wonder if by the end of my second bottle, I was spraying extremely expensive water on my face, crossing my fingers that it would have an impact on my less-than-perfect skin. I'd love the company to speak to how light affects Magic Molecule spray and maybe to throw a discount in the direction of people like me who were sent a light-sensitive solution in a clear bottle.
faceoff_negative.headline: More table magic and less Hogwarts wizardry, at least for me
